Name: Kato Chaidari
Description: A predominantly residential area with a mix of modern and older housing, known for its close-knit community.

Name: Dafni Monastery Area
Description: A historic neighborhood surrounding the famous Daphni Monastery, offering both religious and cultural heritage.

Name: Peristeri Border
Description: A developing area that acts as a boundary between Chaidari and Peristeri, featuring a mix of residential homes and businesses.
